headline: Baker Hughes CEO Lorenzo Simonelli Outlines the Energy Reality of 2026
summary: Lorenzo Simonelli, Baker Hughes CEO, speaks with the WSJ Leadership Institute’s Alan Murray at the World Economic Forum in Davos and discusses the geopolitical conflicts reshaping the global energy market, new opportunities in Venezuela, and reducing carbon emissions.

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Baker Hughes (BKR) After Its Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Baker Hughes shares still offer value after their recent run, or if you might be late to the story, this article will walk you through what the current price could imply. The stock last closed at US$51.75, with returns of 7.9% over 7 days, 15.7% over 30 days, 9.8% year to date, 13.6% over 1 year, 81.6% over 3 years, and 179.4% over 5 years. This naturally raises questions about how much future upside or risk is already priced in. Recent news around Baker Hughes...
